channel.title: Npc Slayer Xp
channel.description:
How would I go about making it so when say, you attack a chicken it gives you so much Xp for killing it for Slayer, I know it is possible. What I am asking for is the code. Not necessarily the whole code for all the NPC's in the slayer Tower. But just one of them and what file I would put it in. If you can help me with this I am very thankful
Thank you, Kevin
